books.title: CALL US WHAT WE CARRY
books.author: Amanda Gorman
books.description: A debut collection of poems on identity and history by the presidential inaugural poet who wrote “The Hill We Climb.”

books.title: THE JUDGE'S LIST
books.author: John Grisham
books.description: The second book in the Whistler series. Investigator Lacy Stoltz goes after a serial killer and closes in on a sitting judge.

books.title: THE STRANGER IN THE LIFEBOAT
books.author: Mitch Albom
books.description: After a ship explodes, 10 people struggling to survive pull a man who claims to be the Lord out of the sea.
